channel.title: [help] for server makers [request]
channel.description: alright, i know how to code a cerver, and everything, making it is the problem, can some1 like make everything for me, and pm to me? i just wanna b able to manage a good server. im not trying to leech, but none of the server tutuorials seem to work for me!

item.title: [help] for server makers [request]
item.dc:creator: @webbsta webbsta
item.description:
@webbsta wrote:

You need to know the basics of programming such as what bytes are and what brackets are used for, for every open { you need a close } otherwise the block of code will most likely screw up the rest of the file. making sure that for every open bracket ({) you have a close bracket (}), make sure there are exactly the same amount of each, if there are more of 1 then the other you WILL get errors.

Read full topic

item.title: [help] for server makers [request]
item.dc:creator: @robot343 robot343
item.description:
@robot343 wrote:

k, plz i need like all the stuff, but i can just put the stuff onto the server and open. i have windows xp, and a computers that fast but doesnt work with alot of things for no reason. ive tried over 100 tutorials(didnt count but obvious) and none of them work for me! ive searched this site, ive searched googe, msn, yahoo, and everything else! nothing works for me!

Read full topic

item.title: [help] for server makers [request]
item.dc:creator: @webbsta webbsta
item.description:
@webbsta wrote:

Well if you know how to code a SERVER then you wouldn’t need our help, most people i know that run servers don’t know how to code, they know how to follow tutorials. don’t for one second think being able to c&p a tutorial or change a slight detail in the file gives you the ability to code a server.

Read full topic

item.title: [help] for server makers [request]
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

It was obvious he’s trying to say server but made a spelling mistake?
